articles.author: Wired
articles.title: AI Is Becoming More Powerful—but Also More Secretive
articles.description: The companies behind ChatGPT and other popular and powerful AI systems aren’t transparent enough about their training data and how they work, according to a new report from Stanford University.
articles.content: Nathan Strauss, a spokesperson for Amazon said the company is closely reviewing the index. Titan Text is still in private preview, and it would be premature to gauge the transparency of a foundation … [+2401 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Gold
articles.title: FTC opens probe into ChatGPT maker OpenAI
articles.description: The FTC is taking a close look at artificial intelligence.
articles.content:
The Federal Trade Commission is opening an investigation into ChatGPT maker OpenAI, exploring how the company manages risks, a source familiar with the matter confirms to Axios.

articles.title: What artificial intelligence is, and how it’s changing our world
articles.description: Understand how generative AI tools, like ChatGPT, Stable Diffusion, and DALL-E, are already shaping everything — from text and image generation to how we live and work.
